description: Officers said the victims did not want to disclose the value of the stolen items.
title: £10k reward offered after 100 handbags stolen from Cheshire home
title_page: £10k reward offered after 100 handbags stolen from Cheshire home - BBC News
maintext:
More than 100 "rare and one-of-a-kind" handbags have been stolen from a home in Cheshire, police have said.
Officers said the victim did not want to disclose the value of the stolen items, which included several unique Hermes handbags and a gold watch.
However, they are offering a £10,000 reward for any information that leads to the arrest and conviction of anyone connected to the burglary, police said.
Police were called to the home in Macclesfield Road, Alderley Edge on 24 February. Offenders used a ladder to enter through a skylight between 7pm and 11pm, police confirmed.
